title: ID, possibly super easy
content:
What is the typeface used for the TYPOPHILE logo up in the upper left?

Is it also the same as the one used for the TYPOPHILE menu and the “filmmakers” page on [http://www.thefallthemovie.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905205927/http:/www.thefallthemovie.com/ "http://www.thefallthemovie.com/") ?

I’ve seen this typeface used EVERYWHERE and it looks incredibly nice set as all-caps/small-caps.

 [‹ Jet airways and a slab-serif...](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905205927/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45107 "Go to previous forum topic") [YOU BETCHA! ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905205927/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45182 "Go to next forum topic")
author: superkhy

comments.content:
It’s Gotham. I’m sure a search would have brought that up.

- Lex
